hero.title: Aya Khlif
hero.subtitle: Full Stack Web Developer | AI-integrated Systems
hero.description: I don't just write code; I engineer scalable digital solutions that drive business growth. With over 3 years of experience delivering enterprise-grade systems across Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, and Syria, I specialize in building scalable web systems, dashboards, APIs, e-commerce platforms, delivery systems, and AI-integrated solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Aya Khlif is a Full Stack Web Developer with over 3 years of professional experience working with companies, freelance clients, and student projects across Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, and Syria. She specializes in building scalable web systems, dashboards, APIs, e-commerce platforms, delivery systems, and AI-integrated solutions.

extend_it.name: Extend IT Solutions
extend_it.desc: Developed the MotoBox delivery ecosystem, Extend social management platform, and Circuit Store e-commerce. Expertise in React Native, Laravel, WebSockets for real-time tracking, and Facebook Graph API integration.

master_coder.name: Master Coders
master_coder.desc: Built Real Estate Management systems, sports club websites with AI (Rasa/Flask) integration, and internal administrative task systems for companies.

maitech.name: MaiTech
maitech.desc: Delivered a wide range of unique and diverse software projects tailored to specific client needs across various domains.

projects.title: Core Projects & Systems
projects.extend_desc: Automated publishing for Facebook & Instagram, managing posts, comments, and Messenger via Facebook Graph API.
projects.motobox_desc: A complete Syrian delivery solution with real-time driver tracking (WebSockets), Firebase notifications, and automated status management.
projects.circuit_desc: High-end E-commerce platform integrated with custom ERP systems and various Qatari payment gateways.
projects.tourism_desc: Reservation system for users to book rooms and trips with an advanced management dashboard.
projects.real_estate_desc: Comprehensive system for listing, selling, and managing properties with a dedicated admin portal.
projects.sports_club_desc: Official website for a sports club featuring a custom-trained AI Bot using Python, Flask, and Rasa package.
projects.admin_system_desc: Internal administrative system for companies to manage employees, tasks, and daily operations efficiently.
projects.printing_desc: Corporate portfolio website for a printing and advertising firm, deployed on Sahara Server/cPanel.

payments.title: Advanced Integrations
payments.description: Successfully integrated these high-level technical services into enterprise solutions.
